Configuring Maintenance Policy

To configure maintenance policy, perform the following:

 1. In the Maintenance Policy Configuration screen, select the Organization from the drop-down list. By default, root is displayed.

 2. Enter the name for the maintenance policy in the Name field.

 3. From the Reboot Policy drop-down list, select the values Immediate or User Ack depending on the requirement. Select Immediate to quickly reboot the policy or select User Ack if the user needs to be informed prior rebooting the policy, and reboot after user’s confirmation.

 4. Click Add to generate maintenance policy

Figure 7-23 Maintenance Policy Configuration

 5. Click Save and next to proceed further.
